timeline.bodyText:
Update comment to:
# Docker does not allow to re-bind a file inside a folder that is also a volume, unless the file already exists.
timeline.author: kokosing
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,2 @@
+# This file is not used.
+# It gets shadowed by further volume mounts.

timeline.message:
Add default access-control.properties file

Since configuration directory (etc) is binded in read-only mode
binding a completely new file in an environment extender is imposible
which is why this placeholder is neeeded.
